replies.msg: LeBron James: All-time great. But no MJ. No Kobe. No real killer instinct. No clutch gene. No late-game free-throw maker.

I'm counting down the days until the slam dunk competition and the all-star game begin !! Vince Carter's brother Mark is gonna throw a birthday party at his place next week but alas I can't attend as I got work to do. When he invited me at first I said "I'll see" Last year he got a king size bed frame and mattress for my birthday. I remember I said "I can't believe you got me a king size mattress and bed frame" They didn't come cheap. Mark is making the most elaborate preparations for his party. My cousin asked him "How are the party preparations going?" Peter is assisting with the party preparations too. Jane is assisting in making preparations for the party as well. They're sharing the preparation themselves so that it isn't too much work. Happy birthday Mark! I'm sure your friends will join me in wishing you a very happy birthday. Charles has received a commission to write an article on Picasso for an art magazine. He's doing research in preparation for the article. His girlfriend is assisting in the preparation of the research as well. His favourite NBA team Toronto Raptors will be playing against Suns in a playoff game next month. A playoff game like this requires proper preparation. The poster and the promo video are in preparation. The players in Raptors are doing thorough preparation for it as they didn't perform well in their last two games because they did no preparation for them. The players in Rockets didn't seem to have done much preparation for their last game too. They almost lost it so this time they're doing meticulous preparation for it including stealing, getting rebounds, three point shooting and blocking as well as cardio training. Training at least five hours a day is ideal preparation for the playoff season. You cannot play against a high level game without adequate preparation. My friend Amy is making preparations for her ski trip in Osaka. She's also making preparations to meet her favourite band X Japan in Tokyo so she's preoccupied with these preparations. Preparations are being made for next month's ski festival in Osaka. The organisations who organise it have announced that preparations for the ski festival are well underway.
